title: California Firm Recalls Chicken and Pork Products for Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, March 1, 2011 - Taylor Farms Pacific, a Tracy, Calif., establishment, has recalled approximately 64,000 pounds of chicken and pork products because the broccoli used in these products may be contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes, the U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Food Safety and Inspection Service...

establishment.name: Taylor Farm - Pacific
establishment.address:
1820 N. Mac Arthur Drive 
  Tracy, CA 95376

impacted_products: “Raley’s Yellow Curry Chicken Rice Bowl” 17 oz.
